title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.3 - Public aircraft parking and storage area charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.3 - Public aircraft parking and storage area charges

State Regulations

For aircraft parked or stored in the public aircraft
parking and storage areas: (a) Free time. For time not exceeding one hour no charge....... (b) Additional
time. For first eight hours or fraction
thereof

For each additional eight hours or
fraction thereof
(1)

For each aircraft not exceeding 5,000 pounds
maximum gross weight for take-off....... $2.00
$1.00
(2)

For each aircraft exceeding 5,000 pounds but not
exceeding 10,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 2.50
1.50
(3)

For each aircraft exceeding 10,000 pounds but
not exceeding 15,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 3.00
2.00
(4)

For each aircraft exceeding 15,000 pounds but
not exceeding 25,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 3.50
2.50
(5)

For each aircraft exceeding 25,000 pounds but
not exceeding 50,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 4.00
3.00
(6)

For each aircraft exceeding 50,000 pounds but
not exceeding 75,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 4.50
3.50
(7)

For each aircraft exceeding 75,000 pounds but
not exceeding 100,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 5.00
4.00
(8)

For each aircraft exceeding 100,000 pounds but
not exceeding 125,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 6.00
5.00
(9)

For each aircraft exceeding 125,000 pounds but
not exceeding 150,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 7.00
6.00
(10)

For each aircraft exceeding 150,000 pounds but
not exceeding 175,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 8.00
7.00
(11)

For each aircraft exceeding 175,000 pounds but
not exceeding 200,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 9.00
8.00
(12)

For each aircraft exceeding 200,000 pounds but
not exceeding 225,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 11.00
10.00
(13)

For each aircraft exceeding 225,000 pounds but
not exceeding 250,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... 13.00
12.00
(14)

For each additional 25,000 pounds or fraction
thereof in excess of 250,000 pounds maximum gross weight, an additional charge
shall be made of....... 2.00
2.00

This schedule of charges shall in no way restrict the

Port Authority from establishing a maximum allowable weight for use of the air
terminal. (c) Maximum
gross weight for take-off
shall have the meaning set forth in the
public landing area charges of this schedule of charges. (d) All operators operating scheduled flights
or using the air terminal as an operating base shall certify to the Port

Authority on or before the 10th day of each month the number of occasions and
the duration of each during the preceding calendar month on which their
aircraft have been parked or stored in the public aircraft parking and storage
areas after the expiration of one hour immediately following a
landing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
